inclusion.criterion: accept being part of the study and share information such as inform consent form readings and demographics.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Not to accept being part of the study and share information such as inform consent form readings and demographics.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man with mild Parkinson's disease, living with his wife and three children. He has hypertension and hypercholesterolemia in his past medical history.
